channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Bus gate traffic light has been turned, 30th December
item.description:
Bus gate (Gloucester Bound) traffic light has been turned. Bus drivers cannot see when the light has turned to green
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Gloucester Road, Hatherley, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet
item.category: Traffic light head is facing wrong direction

item.title: Raised slab caused by the taxi firm starline parking on the pavement, 30th December
item.description:
An elderly lady has just tripped on this raised slab aused by cars parking on the pavement

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 2, Royal Well Lane, Montpellier, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet
item.category: Other damage to pavement i.e. cobbles, raised mound/surface

item.title: Sharp edged pothole getting larger by the day, 30th December
item.description:
On the right hand bend coming downhill. Pothole has been there for a couple of weeks but has got bigger over the last few days. Definitely a danger for car wheels and a significant danger to cyclists and motorcycles.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Paynes Pitch, Churchdown, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.description:

item.title: Road closed sign outside library, 30th December
item.description:
Sign for event in November still outside Cheltenham Library. Next to postbox.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 71 Garden Flat, Clarence Street, St Paul’s, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet
item.category: Signs & Barriers left behind by Contractor

item.title: Road work sign left by side of road., 30th December
item.description:
There is an abandoned road work sign by the car park on Royal well Road. On the road not car park side of the fence. Close to the payment meter. Round the corner on St George’s Road is an abandoned traffic cone. Been there for weeks..

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Royal Well Road, Montpellier, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet
item.category: Signs & Barriers left behind by Contractor

item.title: Pot holes reappeared around fixed areas, 30th December
item.description:
Outside Cleeve View property there have been several pot holes that have been repaired but around the filled in parts there are new pot holes which need repair as they are causing noise and vibration nuisance to residents every time traffic drives over them.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 33, Harp Hill, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet
